title: Several T206's for sale primarily off backs.
author: iwantitiwinit

posts.post_title: Several T206's for sale primarily off backs.
posts.post_content:
T206's for sale, primarily off backs, all prices include shipping.  Please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Bob I.

Howie Camnitz, Hands over Head, Old Mill - PSA 5 (super sharp)  $400 venmo friends or $412.50 pp gs

Rube Geyer, Sovereign 460 - $OLD
Hooks Wiltse, Portrait with Cap SC 350-460/30 - PSA 5(mc) slight name at top $220 venmo friends or $225 pp gs
Ed Abbaticchio, Brown Sleeves, Sovereign 350 - SGC 4 $255 venmo friends or $265 pp gs
Jake Atz, Sovereign 350 - SGC 3 $135 venmo friends or $140 pp gs
Howie Camnitz, Arms Folded, P150 - SGC 4 $OLD

Arlie Latham, Sovereign 460 - SGC 3 $OLD
Carl Lundgren, P350 - SGC 4.5 $275 venmo friends or $282.50 pp gs

Bump.  Looks like some deals here given last night's Sterling prices.
